Title: TileSlider Control for Windows Phone 7
Description: TileSlider is a control for Windows Phone 7 that lets the developer present a tile in their app that behaves like the tiles when you pin a contact to the start menu.
HomeWiki:
What is it?
TileSlider is a control for Windows Phone 7 that lets the developer present a tile in their app that behaves like the tiles when you pin a contact to the start menu.

TileSlider Control v1.0.2.0 is now available.
For those interested, it is also on nuget: http://nuget.org/List/Packages/TileSlider
If you do use it in any of your apps, do let me know, would love to see it in use.

What's new (1.0.2.0)?
  • Add Stretch property to allow better control of the tile's image
  • Add more animation directions for the slide

But let's face it, what does that mean? Well, here's a handy video showing off the control. I have updated this video to show off the new animations

Launch in another window

A better quality version of this video can be found at http://www.screenr.com/pNj.

For how to use it, please go to the Code Usage
